channel.title: Iracing
channel.description:
I hate nascar.. the only thing about it which is interesting is the crashes... but today.. today was my first time playing. Has anyone ever played? Totally worth it. The simulation was freaking amazing.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IRacing.com

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Well those who are lucky enough to win that is just pure lucky. I can’t imagine them doing it for many people.

item.title: Iracing
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

yea the money is certainly an issue, especially for this community.

some company made a deal if people put their company logo on their car and did 10 races with it they would be in a raffle for a free simulator (like an actual car)

Below is the setup I got to play with today (not me) but the setup was at a friends house.

They also have money leagues to play for actual money etc etc and if your a point leader you get free stuff as well… so if your into it, your fun can pay off…

Some pros also play.

Read full topic

item.title: Iracing
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

I hate nascar… the only thing about it which is interesting is the crashes… but today… today was my first time playing. Has anyone ever played? Totally worth it. The simulation was freaking amazing.

en.wikipedia.org

IRacing

iRacing, previously iRacing.com is a subscription-based racing simulation released by iRacing.com Motorsport Simulations in 2008. Official races, special events, league races, and practice sessions are all hosted on the service's servers. The service simulates realistic cars, tracks, and racing events, and enforcing rules of conduct modeled on real auto racing events. iRacing only allows the use of a realistic cockpit view in official racing, but will allow for other camera views in test sessio...

Read full topic
